message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
I'll give you a decent chunk, but I'm not being too generous just yet.
Meet me in the middle, let's make a deal!
You're getting desperate, I'm not going to give in yet.
I'm getting close to the edge, meet me at 55-45!
You're getting desperate, I'm going to take a bigger slice this time.
Last chance, I'll take 70% and leave you with a small but decent share!
You're getting really desperate, I'm going to take almost everything.
I'll take 85% and leave you with a tiny share, but it's my last chance!
You're running out of options, I'm going to take almost everything.
I'll take almost everything, you get the last cent!
I'll take it all, you get nothing!
